sentences.en: Can you utilize a computer in your work?
sentences.cn: 你在工作中能使用计算机 吗 ?

sentences.en: How can we utilize his knowledge and skill to our advantage?
sentences.cn: 我们如何来利用他的知识和技术才对我们有利?

sentences.en: It is justifiable to utilize the concepts of either wave or particles.
sentences.cn: 无论运用波动概念还是运用微粒概念都是合理可取的.

sentences.en: It's wise to utilize all available resources to our advantage.
sentences.cn: 使用所有可用资源为我们服务是明智之举.

sentences.en: Some systems utilize other types of sensors, as thermal sensors, ultrasonic sensors.
sentences.cn: 某些系统使用其他型态的感测器, 例如热感测器 、 ultrasonic感测器等.

sentences.en: Sound engineers utilize a range of techniques to enhance the quality of the recordings.
sentences.cn: 音响师运用一系列技术来提高录音质量。

sentences.en: The company chose to downsize and more fully utilize the remaining workers.
sentences.cn: 公司决定缩小规模,并更加充分地用好余下的工人.

sentences.en: The cook will utilize the leftover ham bone to make soup.
sentences.cn: 厨师要用吃剩的猪腿骨做汤。

sentences.en: The Romans were the first to utilize concrete as a building material.
sentences.cn: 罗马人首先使用混凝土作建筑材料。

sentences.en: The seventh, utilize girl s companion s colony to launch effective education.
sentences.cn: 第七, 利用女生同伴群体开展有效教育.

sentences.en: These headphones also utilize UHPLC copper in the connecting cable.
sentences.cn: 这些耳机还采用UHPLC铜连接电缆.

sentences.en: Utilize bluffing ; bluff with the best - balanced frequency to maximize its usefulness.
sentences.cn: 利用诈骗, 经常的诈骗以最大化的利用诈骗的好处.

sentences.en: Utilize the GPS system to track deer and choose your hunting location.
sentences.cn: 使用全球定位系统追踪鹿群,选择猎鹿地点.

sentences.en: We had another and more pressing reason for attempting to utilize Darlan's position.
sentences.cn: 我们有另一项更急迫的理由需利用达尔郎的地位.

sentences.en: We must consider how best to utilize what resources we have.
sentences.cn: 我们必须考虑怎样充分利用现有的资源。

sentences.en: You must utilize all available resources.
sentences.cn: 你必须利用一切可以得到的资源.

trans.tran_en: to use something for a particular purpose
